body_html:
@apaszke Are we merging this now? Making it compatible with python list should not be a big deal but then I am not sure how to decide what would be the tensor type in case of token IDs (is it OK to assume it will be int) and looks like we need to handle 3 different input kinds then

  • List[Tensors/Variables]
  • List[List[Tensors/Variables]]
  • List[List[Int/Float]]

@apaszke Are we merging this now? Making it compatible with python list should not be a big deal but then I am not sure how to decide what would be the tensor type in case of token IDs (is it OK to assume it will be int) and looks like we need to handle 3 different input kinds then
